title: Nichols Board of Trustees Suite
copy: Please fill out our inquiry form to learn more about rental opportunities.   Available daily, 8:00 a.m.–11:30 p.m. Capacity: 120 reception style, 100 seated dinner, 120 classroom style An ideal space for intimate functions, the Nichols Board of Trustees Suite boasts wall-to-wall, floor-to-ceiling views of Millennium Park, the Frank Gehry Pritzker Pavilion, and Chicago's northern skyline. This exclusive venue is accessible by private elevator and not open to the public, making its spectacular views a rare treat. The small lobby that accompanies the space may be used to welcome your guests with butler-passed champagne and hors d'oeuvres or to station your meeting's registration.
